name: Mekafusion #20 MF09-WHITE-WOLF
description:
Model: MF09-WHITE-WOLF ( Mekanic Fusion no. 9 - WHITE WOLF )
Series: BEAST / MAGIC KNIGHT

Fusions:
BM01-BRAVE ( Base Mekanoid no. 1 - BRAVE )
MB-WOLF ( Meta Beast WOLF )

★ Properties
• Type: Mekafusion
• Skills: Strength, Speed, Hunting skill, Enhanced Sense
• Weapon: Wolf Sabre
• Perks: Embued with Night Magic depending on the shape of the Moon, Enchants Sabre with elemental properties.

A Mekanic fusion between a Base Mekanoid and a Meta Beast Wolf to form an ultimate Mekafusion. A cross fusion from the BEAST and MAGIC KNIGHT series. WHITE WOLF has far sense hearing, smell, remarkable strength, and enhanced visual accuracy depending on the shape of the Moon. WHITE WOLF can also enchant his Wolf Sabre with elemental properties of fire, ice, thunder, holy, and dark energy.

⚔ The Project - Mekafusion [ Mekanic Fusion ] 
An alliance between Meka and Meta to join forces to form ultimate mechanical robotic machines in different series of the Metaverse.

These are digitally hand-drawn in 2D artwork to make Robotic Figures 'Mekanoid'. The concept comes in different series to give mechas their Artificial Intelligence to create their own character and make lots of unique Mekafusions.

The goal is to make robot designs as it was been my childhood hobby to draw robots. Now minted in Tezos blockchain as Non-fungible Tokens (NFT) to give opportunities to art collectors and traders. Image is created in 4000x4000 pixel resolution as an iconic figure art collectible.

You can visit me on my Twitter page as the creator of Mekafusion - @XTZverse

★★★★★
Check out the website for more information at mekafusion.com
